item.description:
Next Tuesday June 5, the Honourable John Manley, former Deputy Prime Minister of Canada and current President of the Canadian Council of Chief Executives will be visiting Boston and would like to meet with some Canadians living in the area. Please join us at the Canadian Consulate for an informal discussion with him from 5:00-7:00 p.m. on Tuesday, June 5. Light snacks and refreshments will be served.
The Consulate General is located at Three Copley Place, suite 400, and can be accessed from the middle escalators and elevators in the mall.

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Meet and Greet with Hon. John Manley
